content.label: Another hit by kairosoft. I played this game so much I was actually sad when I had nothing more to accomplish. I'm currently thinking about getting dungeon village because pretty much all of your games are amazing. But still, my most favorite of your games is still game dev story. Keep up the good work!
Buy it
Awesome game(:

You really need to put out more games and lower the price. I love and own all your games, but you need to make more games. I also have ideas for your company. Some good ideas would be a restaurant Chain , a pet shop, and a hotel. I would buy all those games and I know of a lot of people who would too. Keep up the good work and keep making quality games.
Its easy to understand and very addictive. I love the graphic - pixel perfect.
Love these games
Haven't put it down for 1.5 days
This game is awesome but I got some ideas: a game where you own a news company, a game where you own a press. If you get the chance can you tell me how you made these apps?

Don't listen to the reviews under three stars. They do not accurately rate this game. One of the best! Better than Oh! Edo! I've got FIVE games from this Dev and have not been disappointed. Yes $4 IS WAY TO EXPENSIVE. I'd go $1.99 - $2.99, BUT! I am willing to spend the extra money because I LOVE supporting this Company!!
It's ben like 4 months since last game came out!?!?!?!?!!?!?!??????!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!????¿¡
This one is a mix of RPG and city management.

This is a horrible game and is not worth the four bucks I spent on it! Make somthing better than this, please. Kairosoft is getting worse and worse please make a game that is NOT a waste of money!!!!!:(((((

I feel like kairosofts games have began to decrease in quality. This game seems a lot easier, simpler, and less exciting than most of there other games.  This would be great if it was a free or even a 99 cent game, but it's really not worth the price.
This is a great game, but the touch controls are inaccurate, making it a hassle to play. Also, there is only a single map, which limits replay value.
Boring and feels rushed.  I have purchased and played all of them, and this is by far the worst.  Take it down and start over.  For shame.
Nice idea, but controls and interface in general are too bad. Looks like a direct port of a flash game, with no thoughts or effort put into redesigning for touch control.

title.label: 2nd best only to game dev story

content.label: Game dev story 2 would be cool
You guys should make a game where you get to make your own restraunt.
Remember, citizens can only walk X amount I squares. So if your people don't have a place for them to work, they will stay inside

This is another good product done by kairosoft. I've played it for countless hours. I've also read complaints about the trees and stuff. Eventually you can get the logging ability that allows you to cut them down...so just play through and unlock the things you need. Duh. 

My only complaint is that once I hit the snow region more than half of my residents won't come out of their houses. I've tried everything from demolishing the houses, to sending them on missions. But after they just go back in to sleep and never come out. 
Maybe an update will fix that problem. 
With that said, it is still a good game.

title.label: This game is a lot of fun.

content.label: The game is worth the money . It is tons of fun building a city and going to battle. Its a good time killer for me when at work lol. A must have if you like games like civilization.
It's okay
I love it please do good on your next games

Randomized maps would make the game much more replayable.

I found it difficult to keep track of which citizens were best at battle and which had appropriate equipment. It didn't help that I had to reconstitute my parties from scratch for each type of fighting mission (explore terrain, explore cave, fight space pirates).

Some aspects of game mechanics were difficult to infer from experimentation. I'd have liked to be able to tap on buildings to find out “Why are no aliens visiting this hotel?” or “Why is this factory operating so far under capacity?”.

The iPad support is weak. The game could have higher-resolution graphics, zooming (to see more of the colony at once), and all-at-once tables (to see health, ability, equipment, and skill all at once).
Great u should be able to destroy trees and stuff

I have almost all karisoft games and I love ever game you make but the game you have been making recently are starting to have no replay value like the mall,soccer,and now this game am hoping you"ll be able to make a game with great replay value. I also you make a sequel for game dev or pocket academy
One the best I've played on any iOS device.  Well worth the money.

Great game, but has an issue with saving the progress of your game. Even after pressing the save button multiple times, I come back to find that I have lost some of my progress.

There is no quicker way to lose the fun of it all by having to redo what you already did.

Putting it down for now until there is a fix. Making a game save correctly is like game design 101, and unfortunately here they have missed the mark.
If you like exploring things this is ur game =)
The more you play the better it gets. I'm hyped up for whats coming out in may :)!! Hopefully the dungeon game

Great game. Some replay value. For those complaining about being stuck at 46% all you have to do us build a bridge across the southern part of the map to the snowy section. It is not a bug just requires some thinking
Very fun and addictive, hope to see updates soon!!
Also, could you have an update to expand it so theres more land more planets etc.

Don't listen to the reviews of those people who say it isn't challenging. This game is really challenging and as you progress it get harder in the battle for land. It's a great game and it is nearly on par with game dev. Buy it I bet you love it.
Best yet!
Was going great until the game stopped displaying. All is black except the menus.
I will always buy kairosoft games!
Crashes after level 100! Please fix!
Fun, no replay value, not as good as Game Dev

So disappointed I paid $3.99 for this. I got to 46% and there is nothing else I can do even though there is supposedly 54% left to do. I'm sure in typical kairosoft fashion there will be no fix. Don't waste your money!!

title.label: One of the best games ever.

content.label: Seriously.

Definitely not one of the best game by this developer. Like one of the poster claims, once you beat it, there isn't much replay value to this. I personally would suggest the other one calls game Dev and the other one like castles and dragons, sorry forgot the name. Those two, I couldn't stop playing.
Kinda fun but you pretty much accomplish everything by year 6000 but the end game occurs at year 16,000. Feels like half a game with no point in a replay.
Truly the best installation since gamedev!
Wicked addicting must buy
Cutesy-poo, tedious, and not terribly challenging.

title.label: New ideas, a little too easy.

content.label: Kairosoft added a lot of interesting concepts to this game. Lacks a little in depth at first look, but when you start digging there is some substance there. Unfortunately, you don't really need to dig that deep. This game is a little on the easy side, not extremely, but maybe more so than all the other Kairosoft games , except the soccer one. Still, fun and I was able to get the enjoyment out of it that I should have for $3.99.
Fun as expected and a nice change from the other town managements from Kairo.
Awesome but I played for a week and now there's a huge problem a big. Lack screen on mine I can't even play the app

Brilliant as always kairosoft ! This one has that sense of exploration and some strategy in the combat . These games are some of the best ones on the app store and this one is tied with GDS for my top one . 

Highly recommended ! I do wish the would fix the descriptions on new buildings though, I can't scroll the info on the description .   Otherwise brilliant .
